definition: The capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness.
Brisk and cheerful readiness.

Full of or shedding light; bright or shining.

definition: A pleasant smell that accompanies the first rain after a dry spell.
Too great or extreme to be expressed in words.

Lasting for a very short time.

The state or situation of being alone.
A complicated irregular network of passages or paths.
The strange wistfulness of used bookstores.

definition: Excessive desire to stay in bed.

definition: Vivacious and enthusiastic.
Emitting light as a result of being heated; passionate.
The light and colors produced by rubbing your eyes.
